entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: arijitcodes/microstream-client: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. entry.content: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection. [ NPM üì¶ ]

entry.title: arijitcodes/microstream-hub: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. entry.content: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.
